title: I wanted to buy a duplex printer on Amazon, and these were the top choices for my needs
snippet: Looking for a duplex printer on Amazon? Here are the top choices that balance double sided printing, reliability and value for home and small office needs.

title: Amazon to Meesho race to crack LLM-powered shopping as AI reshapes ecommerce
snippet: Shoppers can now place orders directly from ChatGPT or Claude, without even opening ecommerce apps. That is forcing Amazon, Flipkart, Myntra, Ajio and others to optimize their platforms for AI search.&nbsp;

title: The Quantum Era Crept Up While You Were Watching AI
snippet: Step aside, artificial intelligence. Another transformative technology with the potential to reshape industries and reorder geopolitical power is finally moving out of the lab: quantum.

title: Bharat Taxi to launch nationwide on January 1, 2026: here's everything you need to know
snippet: Bharat Taxi, a government-owned ride-hailing app, launches on January 1, 2026, as a fair alternative to private platforms. Managed by the Sahakar Taxi Cooperative, it benefits drivers by eliminating commissions and offering profit-sharing, with services available nationwide.

title: For the first time, India invites China to its AI Summit
snippet: This marks the first time China has been invited as a partnering nation to India’s annual AI event. The move signals India's intent to lead a unified global policy directive and showcase its domestic foundational models.

title: Oppo Reno 15 Pro Mini price and full specifications leaked ahead of launch: here's what to expect
snippet: Oppo Reno 15 Pro Mini is all set to make its debut in India soon. Ahead of the official unveiling of the device, a new leak has shed some light on the potential pricing and specifications of the compact flagship from Oppo.

title: Motorola Signature confirmed to launch in India on 7 January: here's what to expect
snippet: Motorola Signature will launch in India on January 7, 2026, a day after the Redmi Note 15 and Realme 15 series. The premium device features a fabric finish and a flat display. It is tipped to run on the &nbsp;Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 processor, and come with a triple camera setup.

title: WhatsApp rolls out festive features for New Year 2026: Animated stickers, video call effects and more
snippet: WhatsApp has rolled out four new festive features for the New Year including animated stickers, video calling effects and more. The company also shared some tips for planning a party in group chats.

title: Oppo Pad 5 confirmed to launch in India alongside Reno 15 series: Expected price, specifications and more
snippet: Oppo will soon launch the Oppo Pad 5 in India, confirmed by a Flipkart microsite. The tablet features a 12.1-inch screen, 10,050 mAh battery, and 8MP cameras. It is expected to launch alongside the Reno 15 series.

title: ‘Godfather of AI’ warns software engineering jobs could shrink sharply in 2026: ‘There’ll be very few people needed…’
snippet: AI pioneer Geoffrey Hinton expresses heightened fears about AI's rapid development, predicting job losses by 2026. He gave the example of call centres in areas where AI is already leading to job loss while sounded warning for software engineers

title: 2025 Year in Review: VC reshuffle continues
snippet: Happy Tuesday! As 2025 comes to a close, we at ETtech take a look back as deal values softened in the tech and startup ecosystem, churn continued in venture capital and new age companies, and major shutdowns unfolded. Here's a recap.

title: GCC nation! 90+ new tech centres added 4.5L Indian jobs in 2025
snippet: ​​With new centres opening and hiring continuing at scale, GCCs are now a major driver of jobs and office demand. ET's Tanya Pandey breaks down the numbers behind India’s GCC boom.

title: Investments in AI, cloud set to drive IT spending in 2026
snippet: According to Gartner, overall IT spending in 2026 is estimated to grow 10.6% to $176 billion, compared with the 8.7% growth in the previous year. However, the bigger shift, the research and consultancy firm noted, is not just higher IT budgets but a reallocation of spending.

title: As VC exits pile up, 2026 will test fundraising prospects of independent funds
snippet: Data shared by executive search firm Longhouse shows the industry saw nearly two dozen high-profile departures and lateral moves during the year. title: Louis Gerstner, former IBM CEO who revitalised 'Big Blue,' dies at 83
snippet: IBM ​chairman and CEO Arvind Krishna announced Gerstner's death ⁠in an email sent Sunday to employees, but did not provide a cause of death.

title: Electric two-wheeler maker Ather Energy allots 4.3 lakh shares under Esop plan
snippet: The Bengaluru-based company’s board approved the allotment through a circular resolution passed on December 29, under the Ather Energy Employee Stock Ownership Plan, 2025.

title: Private jobs for locals: Karnataka CM plans to revive policy paused over tech sector protests
snippet: The bill, which the government withheld in July last year, mandated 50% jobs for locals at the management level, and 75% at lower levels.
